timeline.message: #403 enable HomeFinder feature for llvm backend

timeline.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: Should we enable the feature unconditionally or only when LLVM backend is used?
replies.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: unconditionally. At this moment, it is by default enabled in GraalVM for the LIR backend, but defaults can change.
replies.author: johanvos
